pages.title: The Prowler
pages.text: The Prowler will stand between you and The Harbinger. Knock him out of the way! Before getting the heart container, you'll need to slay all of:$(li)The Amethyst Crab$(li)The Wadjet$(li)The Kobolediator$(li)The Prowler$(li)The Ender Golem$(li)The Aptrgangr$(li)The Clawdian
